name: Felix's Autobiography
description:
A quick virtual museum about my life, made using mostly assets from the Unity Store and photos I've taken over the years. Explores my early childhood, high school, college, and career moving forward.

Very hastily made in my free time outside of work.

I hope you enjoy it, are able to learn a little about me, and maybe feel inspired to make an introspective game, yourself. Send it my way if you do!
